alert.note: Alert for Lagrange; Noble; Steuben (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 8:26PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Steuben, northeastern Noble, eastern Lagrange, southeastern St. Joseph and southwestern Branch Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 825 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rome City, or 7 miles north of Kendallville, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of western Steuben, northeastern Noble, eastern Lagrange, southeastern St. Joseph and southwestern Branch Counties, including the following locations... Wolcottville, Stroh, Flint, Brighton, Mongo, Indianola, East Gilead, Lake Gauge, Brushy Prairie and Orland. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 122 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
